Info.description:
This project simulates an exponential spread similar to the spread of covid-19.
You will find 3 project shortcuts: - A single simulation with animation - A MATLAB App that can be deployed using Simulink Compiler - A design study running multiple simulations in parallel using parsim
See this blog post for more details:
https://blogs.mathworks.com/simulink/2020/03/23/covid-19-simulating-exponential-spread-in-simulink
